group_1.textLeft: …Hmph.

group_1.textRight: Dammit, grab the injured and retreat!@We'll join up with the boss…!

group_1.textLeft: You're not going anywhere!
Gen'un, wait! That way lies Endless Hell!

group_1.textRight: …*Sigh*
Sorry… It's unlike me to get so angry.
Hear me, men of Taito!
…Spit it out.

group_1.textLeft: It's only a matter of time before those of you@who consort with Demons are destroyed.

group_1.textRight: If you're so certain about that, then follow@us through Endless Hell.
Bring your friends, too. It'll make it easier@for us to slaughter you all again.

group_1.textLeft: Scum.

group_1.textRight: Princess Tsuyu!

group_1.textLeft: One of our soldiers… What happened?!

group_1.textRight: Kosho's soldiers have regained their@composure!

group_1.textLeft: Then Tsuruno and Sana vanquished@the Demon. Thank goodness.

group_1.textRight: …Now that things are winding down,@I have a favor to ask of you, Tsuyu.

group_1.textLeft: What is it?

group_1.textRight: The Taito Gang are in a position where they@can no longer repair their armaments.
We've cut off their connection with Kosho's@craftsmen. This may be our chance.

group_1.textLeft: You're not suggesting…

group_1.textRight: I know it's not a lowly monk's place to say this,@but it's time we put an end to the Taito Gang.
I will inform Lord Kumai, and once Lord Sumiya@makes his decision,
I will ask you to help us.

group_1.textLeft: Ahh…this is a disaster…
I didn't expect they'd be raring to attack@Taito again…!

group_1.textRight: It feels like we're falling out of sync@with history…
Given we're unable to join the council,@all we can do is await their decision.

group_1.textCenter: Father… I beg of you…@Please stop Gen'un…
…All of that is my appeal to you, my liege.
I know you've hardly had a chance to rest,@given you've just returned from Kyoto,
but I humbly beseech you to consider@my words, Lord Sumiya.
I would like your approval to crush@the Taito Gang.

group_1.textRight: Well, what should we do…?@Your thoughts, Lord Kumai?

group_1.textLeft: I think you ought to go with how you felt@upon your return to Soma.

group_1.textRight: …I see.
Lord Kumai told me of your plight, and I have@seen the devastation wrought upon my domain.
If this is not punishment from the gods,@but the result of man's will,
then as the one responsible for this land,@I cannot remain silent.

group_1.textLeft: Well said, my liege.

group_1.textRight: Lord Kumai.

group_1.textLeft: Yes?

group_1.textRight: The strongest men in our alliance are all@gathered here.
Henceforth, as our army magistrate, you are@to take command and devise a strategy.

group_1.textLeft: In that case, I feel you ought to be our@commander-in-chief in this battle, my liege.
It would inspire and rally the soldiers who@were injured in the previous battle.

group_1.textRight: So be it. I'll do as you say.

group_1.textLeft: We of Suitoku Temple will do all we can@to assist you.
There will be no peace unless we eliminate@the Taito Gang,
so let us expel them to the Pure Land@and restore tranquility!

group_1.textRight: Please wait, my liege.

group_1.textLeft: W-what is it, Lord Mizuna?
You're always acting on your impudence.@You have no room to object!

group_1.textRight: Please forgive my impertinence, my liege…@but I have one question.

group_1.textLeft: Hm… You may ask.

group_1.textRight: Why is Master Gen'un convinced that@the Taito Gang controls Demons?
The truth, as far as I know, is that no one@has ever witnessed this.

group_1.textLeft: What a bizarre thing for you to say,@Masatsuna.
Tales of the Taito Gang's Demons have been@passed down through Mizuna for generations.

group_1.textRight: For generations? What are you talking about?

group_1.textLeft: The Taito Gang has been feeding upon others@to preserve itself since time immemorial,
and Suitoku and Mizuna have been working@together to destroy them for just as long.

group_1.textRight: Feeding upon…?

group_1.textLeft: The Taito Gang uses Demons to steal the lives@of innocents so they may extend their own.
If you have any doubts, just read this letter…
This is the oath we made together,@stamped with Mizuna's seal.

group_1.textCenter: We and Taito were supposedly united once…
But…according to Suitoku's charter, the Taito@Gang has always been our enemy…
I can't tell what's true anymore…

group_1.textRight: The key problem now is Endless Hell.
It's the only way that leads to Taito Village.
Will our soldiers be willing to make that trek?

group_1.textLeft: No need to be concerned.
We've found the way through Endless Hell.
We're in position to take action and attack@any time you please.
